humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the left breast and axillary tail specimen (E) contains an invasive lobular carcinoma that measures 4 cm in size. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the right breast specimen (B) has an adenoid cystic carcinoma with a size of 3 cm, and the left breast specimen (E) has an invasive lobular carcinoma with a size of 4 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2, which corresponds to a tumor size of 2.1 to 5.0 cm.
